p.d: 30, the age of responsibility. Martin is about to leave on holiday with his wife Ariane and his baby when he meets Constance, his ex, the love of his youth. On the spur of the moment he invites her and her family to join them for a few days' holiday. Directed by: Benoît Cohen (France, 2003) Cast: Romane Bohringer (Constance), Mathieu Demy (Martin), Laurence Côte (Ariane), Mathias Mlekuz (Arnaud), Fabio Zenoni (Jean-Marc), Eléonore Pourriat (Claire), Julien Boisselier (Simon) Genre: comedy Awards: Jury Grand Prix (Saint-Malo 2003)
